response.overview: Kim is 23, sexy and tough as hell. In every sense of the word. She likes to hang out with her RED DOGZ, a cool group of loyal soccer fans, and go into big, brutal fights with them. Especially against their archenemies, the BLUE BASTARDS. When Kim plunges headfirst into a hot affair with Blue Bastard Ben, things start to spin out of her control. Kim is torn between her evolving feelings for Ben and her loyalty to the Red Dogz.Things get worse when ROCCO, the Dogz' leader and forever unhappily in love with Kim, discovers her secret. He sets into motion a series of events that will leave no one unscarred. Especially Kim.
response.title: Red Dogz
